mapper.select: select * from pets inner join owners o on pets.ownerId = o.ownerId inner join types t on pets.typeId = t.typeId
select * from pets inner join owners o on pets.ownerId = o.ownerId inner join types t on pets.typeId = t.typeId where petName = #{petName}
select * from pets inner join owners o on pets.ownerId = o.ownerId inner join types t on pets.typeId = t.typeId where typeId = #{typeId}
mapper.insert: insert into pets (petName, petBirthday, typeId, ownerId) values (#{petName}, #{petBirthday}, #{typeId}, #{ownerId})
insert into visits (petId, visitDate, description) values (#{petId}, #{visitDate}, #{description})
